actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-39.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 94-127.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of a revised edition of the House document, "Our American Government, What is it?  How Does It Function?"

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Provides that there shall be printed, as a House document, a revised edition of the House document "Our American Government. What Is It? How Does It Function?" Provides that 566,000 additional copies be printed, of which 442,000 shall be for the use of the House of Representatives and 103,000 shall be for the use of the Senate, and 1,000 shall be for the use of the House Committee on Rules and 20,000 shall be for the use of the Joint Committee on Printing.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of a revised edition of the House document, "Our American Government, What is it?  How Does It Function?"
